Declaration (声明)

char gender = 'M';

  • Declare a variable called gender.
  • You can use gender later in your program.
  • The type of gender is char (character).
  • gender is initialized (初始化) to the character M.
  • You can assign (赋值) other values to gender.
  • gender refers to a location (object) in memory.

Definition (定义)


char gender = 'M';

This is also a definition.


Any definitions are declarations.


All declarations are definitions (for now).

Identifier (标识符)

char gender = 'M';


gender is an identifier (标识符).
